title: 1909-1911 t206 sweet caporal 350-360 fac 42 scroll harry steinfeldt w/ bat sgc

posts.post_title: 1909-1911 t206 sweet caporal 350-360 fac 42 scroll harry steinfeldt w/ bat sgc
posts.post_content:
SGC 2.5 35.  Seems to be hard to find player back combo.  Only a couple have been graded through PSA SGC.  Presents really well.  Asking $100.  Includes priority shipping.

[URL=http://s1243.photobucket.com/user/southernsportscards/media/BASEBALL/LY83_1014_med_zpshidnfox8.jpeg.html][IMG]http://i1243.photobucket.com/albums/gg541/southernsportscards/BASEBALL/LY83_1014_med_zpshidnfox8.jpeg[/IMG][/URL]

David
